footer.description: Wedding Photographer based in Hauts-de-Seine (92) near Paris, France

carousel-testimonials.title: Testimonials
carousel-testimonials.description1: Jeremy captured all the important moments of our day. Thank you so much for your support, advice, and patience throughout the day.
carousel-testimonials.alt1: Wedding photo at Domaine Ferme Sainte Anne by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description2: His creative ideas and the grain of the photo editing added a magical touch. We highly recommend Jeremy's services to all future brides and grooms looking for a talented and flexible photographer!
carousel-testimonials.alt2: Wedding photo at Domaine de la Gillardière by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description3: Pleasant, available, and attentive to both the couple and guests. Everyone was delighted with the work and the flow of the day. To all future couples, I warmly recommend Jeremy for his energy, professionalism, kindness, and great spirit.
carousel-testimonials.alt3: Wedding photo in the North of Montpellier by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description4: I can only recommend Jeremy for his discretion, punctuality, efficiency, talent, but most importantly for his human side.
carousel-testimonials.alt4: Wedding photo at Lac des Estives in Montgreleix by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description5: We hired Jeremy for our wedding following a recommendation from one of our friends, and we were not disappointed: professional and involved on the big day, he was also appreciated by all the guests.
carousel-testimonials.alt5: Wedding photo in the North of Montpellier by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description6: I stumbled upon his work from another wedding and it was obvious: I had found the photographer for my event. Snapshots full of spontaneity, moments of happiness and joy immortalized
carousel-testimonials.alt6: Wedding photo at Domaine des Mylords in Tarascon by Jeremy Dan

photo-tiles.title: Capturing the Moment
photo-tiles.description: Each moment you live is a page of a greater story – your story. And every story deserves to be told with authenticity and sincerity. My role as a photographer is to capture the essence of these fleeting moments, so they remain forever etched in your memories.

home-page.subtitle: Authentic Photos for Real People.
home-page.description1: There is nothing more incredible than finding the person you can't live without. Your true best friend, the one who makes your heart race every day. It's this unique connection that I want to photograph. Whether we go on an adventure to a spectacular place or explore the warm intimacy of your own home, my goal is to capture your true personalities, your raw emotions, and everything that makes you, you.
home-page.description2: Don't hold back. This moment only happens once in a lifetime. Be yourself, and I'll be myself.
home-page.description3: My work reflects my commitment to staying true to you, to what you feel, and to what unites you. I want every shot to be a mirror of your love, full of nuance and depth.
home-page.bullets-title: I draw inspiration from simple and poetic details:
home-page.bullet1: Natural, soft, and enveloping light that highlights every emotion.
home-page.bullet2: A style evoking film photography, with warm, natural colors, and a touch of grain that brings a timeless and cinematic texture to your photos.
home-page.bullet3: Candid moments, caught in the moment, that tell a truth that posed shots cannot capture.
home-page.description4: My work reflects my commitment to staying true to you, to what you feel, and to what unites you. I want every shot to be a mirror of your love, full of nuance and depth.
home-page.description5: Memories are not just meant to be lived, but to be preserved and shared. Whether it's during an outdoor ceremony, in an intimate setting, or at the heart of a lively family celebration, my goal is to create images for you that tell more than just a moment – they tell your story.
home-page.description6: It's not just about taking photos, but creating a visual legacy. Something that looks like you, that you can pass on and cherish forever.
home-page.description7: Are you ready to create something real with me?

about-page.alt: Photo of Jeremy Dan, wedding photographer.

about-section.description1: Introducing oneself can be a delicate exercise, but so important when entrusting such an important moment to a photographer. So here's my little story!
about-section.description2: My name is Jeremy, I'm 28 years old, and I have the privilege of sharing my life with the person who gives it meaning. I have three passions: photography, music, and skateboarding. Each of these fuels my creativity and my vision of the world. When I'm not behind the lens capturing your precious moments, I'm in front of my screen coding
about-section.description2-cont: . The website you're browsing was actually designed by me. French is my native language, and I'm fluent in English. In love with Sweden, I'm also learning Swedish and hope to spend a few years exploring the beauty and serenity of Scandinavian landscapes. I love stepping out of my comfort zone, discovering new perspectives, and learning from what the world has to offer. Each experience enriches my vision and, ultimately, my work as a wedding photographer.
about-section.description3: Photography is much more than a profession to me: it's a philosophy. It allows me to get closer to what really matters – human relationships, the bonds we build, and the emotions we share. I firmly believe that we don't always pay enough attention to the fleeting moments of our lives. These ephemeral moments, so precious, deserve to be captured with authenticity and sincerity. My goal is to offer you beautiful, true, and moving images that tell your story, just as it is. I strive to capture every detail, every smile, every knowing look, without artifice, but with all the sensitivity that characterizes these unique moments.
about-section.description4: My goal is to capture these significant moments with the sincerity that characterizes them. I want these images to be beautiful and true, regardless of the occasion. In the end, that's what matters most to me.
about-section.bullet1-title: The real, the simple, the spontaneous
about-section.bullet1: A discreet tear, a burst of laughter, a sincere embrace.
about-section.bullet2: Those that tell your story and make it unique.
about-section.bullet3: Natural colors, the subtle grain of film combined with cinematic contrasts.
about-section.bullet4: Overly posed or artificial setups that don't reflect your authenticity.
about-section.bullet5: Ephemeral trends that risk dating your memories instead of enhancing them.
about-section.bullet6: Generic photos devoid of the emotion and context that make you unique.

portfolio-page.description: A selection of some of my favorite photos from the weddings I've covered.

blog-page.title: Journal
blog-page.description: Some love stories close to my heart that I want to share with you.

wedding-domaine-gillardiere.title: Wedding at Domaine de la Gillardière
wedding-domaine-gillardiere.excerpt: A beautiful wedding in the heart of Brie-Comte-Robert at Domaine de la Gillardière.
wedding-domaine-gillardiere.description: A hundred guests were present to celebrate Roxane and Tanguy's wedding. Emotional speeches, minimalist decoration, and an evening introduced by a majestic dance.

gridImage.alt: Wedding photo at Domaine de la Gillardière by Jeremy Dan

coverImage.alt: Wedding photo at Domaine de la Gillardière by Jeremy Dan

civil-wedding-levallois.title: Civil Wedding in Levallois-Perret
civil-wedding-levallois.excerpt: A wedding celebrated among family and close friends in the beautiful town hall of Levallois-Perret.
civil-wedding-levallois.description: Two humans I particularly love for their integrity and joy of life. We crown it all with lots of humor, DIY for all the decorations, and a good dose of simple but just right, for a moment that was simply genuine.

gridImage.alt: Wedding photo at Domaine de la Gillardière by Jeremy Dan
